text: Saturday Night is a 2024 American biographical comedy-drama movie directed by Jason Reitman. It is about the making and release of the first episode of NBC's Saturday Night, later known as Saturday Night Live. The movie stars Gabriel LaBelle as the show's creator and producer, Lorne Michaels with Rachel Sennott, Cory Michael Smith, Ella Hunt, Dylan O'Brien, Emily Fairn, Matt Wood, Lamorne Morris, Kim Matula, Finn Wolfhard, Nicholas Braun, Cooper Hoffman, Andrew Barth Feldman, Kaia Gerber, Tommy Dewey, Willem Dafoe, Matthew Rhys, and J. K. Simmons also appearing. Saturday Night had a limited theatrical release in the United States on September 27, 2024 to positive reviews. ==References== Category:2020s biographical movies Category:2024 comedy movies Category:2024 drama movies Category:2020s comedy-drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jason Reitman
title: Saturday Night (2024 movie)
